actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding elimination of the portion of the national debt held by the public by 2015 or earlier.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that Congress and the President should work together to eliminate the portion of the national debt held by the public by 2015 or earlier.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding elimination of the portion of the national debt held by the public by 2015 or earlier.
